mobileResponsivenessTip: Improve touch target sizes and text readability on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize image sizes and enable browser caching to improve loading speed.
seoOptimizationTip: Add relevant meta descriptions, optimize image alt text, and improve internal linking.
userExperienceTip: Consider simplifying navigation and providing more prominent calls to action.
